docs.lead_paragraph: Underdog Tony Bellew stopped former WBA heavyweight champion David Haye in the 11th round of their thrilling clash at London's O2 Arena on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Boxing: Underdog Bellew Stuns Haye in Heavyweight Clash
headline.main: Boxing: Underdog Bellew Stuns Haye in Heavyweight Clash

docs.snippet: Underdog Tony Bellew stopped former WBA heavyweight champion David Haye in the 11th round of their thrilling clash at London's O2 Arena on Saturday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Joel Berry II and his North Carolina teammates had already wrapped up an Atlantic Coast Conference regular-season title and a No. 1 seed in next week's tournament before tipping off against rival Duke.

headline.main: Berry Helps No. 5 Tar Heels Beat No. 17 Blue Devils 90-83

docs.lead_paragraph: With goals from four players, first-place Montreal won its fifth straight game and handed the Rangers their third loss in four games.

docs.lead_paragraph: Brooke McCarty led four Texas players in double figures with 13 points and the No. 12 Longhorns beat Oklahoma State 71-60 on Saturday night in the quarterfinals of the Big 12 Conference Tournament.
